title: Bug, lost season icon,Victorious Morgana Skin
body: I got gold in season 3. In season 4, I have played some ranks to make that I stay in gold. end of season, I got season 4 reward, including Morgana skin and I have play one normal game with that skin. After one update, I lost everything about season reward include Morgana skin.

replies.body:
Hi LTNscr, 

See if this article applies to you:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751834-MMR-Elo-Boosting
If not, please feel free to open a support ticket with one of our Customer Service Representatives, whom will review personally review your accounts.
That's all nice and dandy, but what if we want the Victorious skin but aren't necessarily good enough for Gold V? How do we get the skin then?
You don't. It's for people who've worked hard to get where they are and deserve something for it.

Fuck that. Just because you aren't a member of the largest tier in the game doesn't mean jack. Nobody deserves anything, and boosting might not be a problem if season rewards didn't involve skins that once they are doled out, can never be received. It's a slap in the face to over 50% of ranked players who tried their damnedest. You worked hard to get at least Gold tier? Bravo, you don't deserve anything more than a pat on the back; you aren't entitled to anything and the fact Riot gives people extremely limited skins encourages boosting.
Those skins are for people that've worked their asses off and have  dedicated time to getting better at this game. If you aren't willing to do the same thing then you don't get the skin. Make sense?
I worked my ass off and I didn't get one. No, it doesn't really make sense.

Then I don't think you worked hard enough. You've got to understand that these skins aren't meant for everyone to have, they're supposed to be a rarity.'i worked my ass off too but I'm not going to complain to riot that I wasn't good enough.

It's not a problem that silver is more difficult to climb than gold, or that silver is overwhelmingly the largest tier in the game? Riot designed the system, and it's not their fault they can't make the distribution tighter?

I'm not sure what you're trying to say. You think silver is harder to climb out of when clearly, if it's so hard to get out of silver then more skilled opponents will be in gold to prevent you from climbing. And how would you know how difficult it is if you've never been in gold? Next, why are you complaining about how big the division is? Would you prefer longer queue times?

How much does a boost to gold go for nowadays? Thirty, forty dollars? Think about how many skins you could have bought with that money. What a waste.


Also git gud, scrub.

Back when the chat rooms were all over you'd see so many people in those that were doing it for like $25+ a division...so that's more like $125 if you were say Bronze 5 to Silver 5... so they made pretty ridiculous money off of the people that went through with it.
